meanings.definition: The quality or state of being multitudinous.
meanings.sent1: The multitudinousnesses of the crowd at the concert was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The multitudinousnesses of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The multitudinousnesses of options at the ice cream shop made it hard to choose.
meanings.sent4: The multitudinousnesses of colors in the sunset painted the sky beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The multitudinousnesses of books in the library filled every shelf.

meanings.sent1: The multitudinousnesses of people at the parade made it hard to see.
meanings.sent2: The multitudinousnesses of flowers in the garden created a colorful display.
meanings.sent3: The multitudinousnesses of toys in the store delighted the children.
meanings.sent4: The multitudinousnesses of waves crashing on the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The multitudinousnesses of birds in the sky created a symphony of chirps.
